commit message: ItemsContentProvider: Get more items in the background when we get below a minimum.
Changes by the latest Android Studio.
ClassifyFragment: onLoadFinished(): Avoid repeated calls, and resultant updates().

ItemsContentProvider: Use ASC as the default sort order.

Otherwise, the 'next' item will change just by adding a new item to the
table.

ClassifyFragment: Add a spinner when waiting for the 'next' item.

Because this could need some network I/O to get the first item into
the cache.
